RHESSys conferences provide an opportunity to share, learn, and network with other RHESSys modelers.

To get announcements about upcoming conferences, please sign up for the [RHESSys mailing list](about_us.qmd).

## 2024

[RHESSys Conference 2024](conferences/conference_2024.qmd) will be held virtually on May 1-2, 2024.
